attributes.action: make significant changes to laws and sentencing, increasing punishment for sexual preditors, child molesters and abusers.
attributes.additional_details: Tougher punishment should be given to sexual preditors and child abusers. These forms of abuse ruin lives, cause misery to victems and thier families, a never ending struggle. Toughen laws and keep our communities and children safe. Give justice and peace of mind to those whose innocence have been stolen.
